content.data:
[Y]Safe Maintenance
[W]Protect the machine while fixing it.
[c][m.]
[W]Power down fully before opening
[W]hardware and avoid force on old
[W]plastics.
[W]Clean contacts gently and store media
[W]away from dust and magnets.
[c][m.]
[G]- Power off first.
[G]- Handle cables gently.
[G]- Label repaired units.
[m][m-]
[Y]SAFETY
[C]Rushing repairs often creates new
[C]faults.
[c][m.]
[C]0 MAIN   [W]# HELP
